data.text: Ɠima anzanui ná-pɛlɛyeɠei loni,
Zɔi é ziɛzu telebodai zu, naa ɠa ɗa ziɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai zu,
Ɠimalala nui ɠa ɗa maaɠoloi zɔlɔɔ ga daawooiti maaʋele,
Ʋɛ wozawoli nikɛ la ná, daamianigi ɠa daamii ɲakai zu,
Zeelei sɔlegai, é la zɛɛ woga pɛ,
Anɛɛ ni ɲɛɛɠulasu nui ɠa ɠimalai ɠaiziɛ, é la sɔlɔɔga,
Maaɠooza faaɠaaɠalala nui ʋa,

Kidafaawu nui ɠa ɗa siɛ ʋelei ʋɛtɛ, tɔɔzei toɠa ga ɠima nui,14:8 Kidafaawu nui ɠa ɗa siɛ ʋelei ʋɛtɛ, tɔɔzei toɠa ga ɠima nui: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: Kidafaawu nui ná-ɠimalai ɠa ɗa ɓɔ ba, é siɛ ʋelei ʋɛtɛ
Ɠimalala nuiti ta ɗa ɲɛɛɠula zɔɠɔzuɓɛtɛ vai zu,
Ɛsɛ nɔ ɠa é ná-ziizoolɛi ɠwɛɛ, ta ná-koozunɛɛi,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-ʋɛlɛi ɠa wolo,
Ta ɠa ná, siɛ ʋelei zɔlegai gaazu,
Ɲɛɛi ɠa zoo é ziizoolɛi ɠaazumaalɔɔɠu,
Kɔzɔba nui ɠa ɗa ná-kɛɛwotiiti ma ɠulanumai zɔlɔɔ,
Nui nii é la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, toɠa ɗa la naati kpein da, niiti ti wosu ma,
Ɠima nui ɠa ɗa lua faa ɲɔi ʋa, é ʋoluave,
Ziiɠula nui ɠa ɗa ɠimalala vaiti kɛ,
Nuiti ti la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, naati ta-ʋoganii ɠa é ga ɠimalalai,
Nu ɲɔiti ta ɗa unmaayei nu ʋagɔiti bɛ,
Bala nui la nɛɛni nu nɔpɛ bɛ, anɛɛ seiɲɔɠɔiti,
Zɔi é seiɲɔɠɔi wɔinzeɠezu, naa ɠa koto ɠɛɛzu,
Niiti ti ɠisiɛzu faa ɲɔi zu, naati ta kaka pelei ma,
Botii kpein ka kulanumai ba,
Ɠima nuiti ta-masa bɔɔlɔgi ɠa é ga ta-naavoloi,
Gaama wo zeelei ɠa ɗa zɛnvuiti kizo,
Zɔi é luazu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa, naa ɠa kito gola zɔlɔɔ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa é ga zɛnvu ɗɛungi,
Nuɓusɛi ná-mɔin ɠa é ga masagi ná-lɛbiyai,
Zɔi zii la ɠula fala, naa ɠa ná-ɠimala wolai lɛɛzu,
Ziilɛigi ɠa é ga kpusɛi ná-sii zuɠoozagi,
Nu a bala nui maanɔɠɔna, é Kpɛtɛ Nui ʋɛlɛʋɛlɛga,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ná-yaavai ɠa ɗa toka,
Ɠimalai ɠa ɗa zei keleɠele nui yiimaʋɛ,
Telebodai ɠɛɛ vai ɠa ɗa zooi wɔɔlɔ,
Masagi ná-unfemai ɠa ɗa ɠɛ botiɠɛ nui naati bɛ, niiti ti botii ɠɛɛzu bɛ ga ɠimalai,
